case.name: Present offer
case.description: Rosa offers a present to the people at the table, as an incentive for winning.

case.name: Is it wrong to try to pick girls at the Inventory?
case.description: Rosa mentions that part of the reason why she came to the Inventory is to look for a significant other.

notes.note: Rosa mentions that she doesn't remember the rules for Poker.

I'm actually curious about this: can a person with no balls be considered a biological male? Don't they make, like, hormones and stuff like that? Oh shit, maybe Bi and Trans are the same person and the Bi lore is even more profound than we all imagined...
I don't know, this line might sound a bit too forceful. Maybe a different stripping pose would help. Either way, I'm trying to convey more carefreeness than forcefulness.
Haha who would write lines for an offline background. Me. Although addmitedly, I didn't realize it was offline until after I wrote these lines. But hey, linecount go brrrr.
I've never tried taiyaki myself. I'm curious.
Moon is best pokégirl don't @ me.
Pick a card, any card. The seven of wives? Excellent choice.

markers.marker: Rosa wonders about the moveset that AE-86, a car, would have.
Rosa remarks on the fact that she can't get a tan, no matter how much time she spends under the sun.
Rosa says that France is not a familiar place; naturally, as it doesn't exist in the Pokémon World. One of the many reasons why it's superior to the real world.
Response to Aster's wives prompt.
Rosa comments on the fact that there are a lack of Pokémon in the beach, which is unusual to her.
Rosa theorizes that Bi is actually a woman without a vagina, rather than a man with no balls.

Miko refuses to play alongside Bi, so she left. Why did I target this? Well, that seems worthy of targeting, even if unusual, so the better question is why did I put a marker on this line. I don't know either.
Response to Bobobo's line when Ochako starts masturbating. Since she doesn't know what a bee is, she is confused about it.
Response to Bobobo's line about her buns. If you took those off, she wouldn't die, but it would be extremely painful.
Rosa's lines to Bobobo's peculiar method of disundergartmentening. Should be pretty self-explanatory.
Rosa recognizes Colress as a scientist that worked for Team Plasma. She also has a line for when he is stripping off his first item of clothing.
Answer to Colress's Ultra Wormhole prompt.
Rosa is surprised Cynthia lost before her.
Rosa offers Cynthia a role in one of Pokéstar Studios movies.
Rosa asks Cynthia whether she or Iris is a stronger Pokémon Trainer.
Responses to Cynthia's line about her not-daughter.
Filtered line to those with the has_food tag.
Answer to Fina's dating advice prompt. Rosa doesn't have any experience with dating, but she tries to help with her advice.
Targeted line to Yuelia when she loses for her first time.
Response to Fluttershy's Bird talk Question prompt.
Response to Fluttershy's targeted line for Rosa's first loss.
Rosa wonders about the nature of a ghost's garments.
Rosa mentions having seen a ghost before.
Rosa thinks about the inevitabilty of having to strip in a strip poker game.
Answer to Jura's line when Rosa loses for the first time
Response to the magma grunt question about how much money she makes from the movies that she's in, that plays in Rosa's 1-stripped stage.
Question to Magma Grunt about whether she earn money from being in Team Magma.
Answer to May's question of who is your favorite Pokémon.
Answer to May's prompt about living around here.
Special variation of the answer to May's prompt about living around here.
Answer to Miko's prompt about desires. Is a simple life the key to happiness?
Rosa wants to know how Misaka's electric powers work.
Rosa asks Misty how does she have time to go on dates.
If both the new and old Misty are present at the table, Rosa will comment that they might be from parallel universes.
Rosa's line when Misty loses for the second time. It's pretty generic tbh.
If Misty starts stripping first, she makes a remark about having a type advantage, since she specializes in Grass-type Pokémon and Misty specializes in Water-type Pokémon.
N has left the game, because you are a bad person.
Response to Nagisa's prompt about her butt.
Response to Nagisa's prompt about the floor being sticky.
Reaction to the ''Nami drops something'' situation.
If I did this correctly, this line should make it so Rosa calls Alolan mom ''ma'am''.
If she's in a table with no other Pokémon characters, Rosa will remark that it is odd to her that there are people who don't live alongside Pokémon.
Pokephilia movies? That seems more like something Moon would do...

If she has a bad hand while playing on the rooftop, she complains about the lack of plants. These markers also serve as setup for a chain, so that each line is said in order, and isn't said more than once.
Second line in the chain of musings about the lack of plants.
Rosa says that she'll give a present to the winner of the game. It's her tm collectible, so it's what tvtropes calls gameplay and story integration.
Rosa mentions that part of the reason why she came to the Inventory is to look for a significant other.
Rosa worries about stepping on her Xtransceiver (the thing on her left arm). It is not known where the clothes go, so I just assumed they were put in a pile or something.
A tie happened.
A tie happened for the second time.
When she is in a table with both the old and the new Ryuko, Rosa will wonder whether one of them is a Ditto.
Answer to Saki's prompt abut having bad luck.
Reaction to Saki's zombie reveal.
Filtered line to those with the school_uniform tag; there are two of them, maybe I should do separate markers?
Filtered line to those with the succubus tag; Rosa is unsure about the word ''succubus''.
Rosa's various musings about Takatoshi's food. They are meant to play in a row, and they (should) trigger a more direct question from Rosa.
This is the more direct question to Takatoshi.
Filtered line to those with the weapon tag; Rosa asks why would you bring a weapon to a cards game.

Filtered line to those with the winged tag; Rosa mentions that the wings remind her of a certain pokémon. Which pokémon depends on the characters, but she'll probably have a more detailed answer if you ask her.
Filtered line to those with the witch tag; Rosa is comparing the target with the witch from one of the movies she has starred in.
